localized_strings.amazon_subscription_manage: You can manage your subscription in the Amazon Appstore app on an Amazon device.
localized_strings.apple_subscription_manage: You can manage your subscription by using the App Store app on an Apple device.
localized_strings.default_body: Please describe your issue or question.
localized_strings.going_to_check_purchases: Let's take a look! We're going to check your account for missing purchases.
localized_strings.google_subscription_manage: You can manage your subscription by using the Play Store app on an Android device.
localized_strings.please_contact_support: Please contact support to manage your subscription.
localized_strings.purchases_not_recovered: We could not find any purchases with your account. If you think this is an error, please contact support.
localized_strings.purchases_recovered_explanation: We restored your past purchases and applied them to your account.
localized_strings.refund_error_generic: An error occurred while processing the refund request. Please try again.
localized_strings.sub_earliest_expiration: This is your subscription with the earliest expiration date.
localized_strings.sub_earliest_renewal: This is your subscription with the earliest billing date.
localized_strings.try_check_restore: We can try checking your Apple account for any previous purchases
localized_strings.update_warning_description: Downloading the latest version of the app may help solve the problem.
localized_strings.you_have_promo: You've been granted a subscription that doesn't renew
localized_strings.web_subscription_manage: You have an active subscription that was created on the web. You can manage your subscription by visiting your account.
localized_strings.free_trial_single_payment_then_price: Try {{ sub_offer_duration }} for free, then {{ sub_offer_duration_2 }} for {{ sub_offer_price_2 }}, and {{ price }} thereafter
localized_strings.free_trial_discounted_then_price: Try {{ sub_offer_duration }} for free, then {{ sub_offer_price_2 }} during {{ sub_offer_duration_2 }}, and {{ price }} thereafter
